title: Haley Smith, Matt Beers win Truckee Tahoe Gravel
content:
For some, the high altitude race was a tune up for next weekend's Crusher in the Tushar; some 625 riders competed over the race's three distances.

Read the full article at Haley Smith, Matt Beers win Truckee Tahoe Gravel on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
